column7: Principles and application of heat transfer by conduction, convection, and thermal radiation. Prerequisite: MATH 285 or MATH 286 or MATH 441; ME 310 or TAM 335; credit or concurrent registration in ME 200.
column9: Prerequisite: MATH 285 or MATH 286 or MATH 441; ME 310 or TAM 335; credit or concurrent registration in ME 200.
column11: Students must register for one lab and one lecture section.
